csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0"
      xml:lang="en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <macro name="title">
    <text quotes="true" suffix="," variable="title" />
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="Ignore me" />
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography>
    <layout>
      <text macro="title" />
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
